Dex Explorer.Name: Dex Explorer
Dex Explorer.Description: Dex Explorer V4 is a game explorer which is really useful for developers!

Remote Spy.Name: Remote Spy
Remote Spy.Description: Allows you to view and log RemoteEvents, RemoteFunctions, etc called in the instance.

Script Dumper.Name: Script Dumper
Script Dumper.Description: Dumps all LocalScripts and ModuleScripts in the game.

Infinite Yield.Name: Infinite Yield
Infinite Yield.Description: The best admin command script with various function rich commands!

Owl Hub.Name: Owl Hub
Owl Hub.Description: One of the best script hubs and universal aimbot + esp!

VG Hub.Name: V.G Hub
VG Hub.Description: V.G Hub, A Free and Convenient scripthub supporting 140+ games!

CMD X.Name: CMD X
CMD X.Description: Another admin command script like Infinite Yield, but has way more commands.

Unfair Hub.Name: Unfair Hub
Unfair Hub.Description: Supporting more than 60+ games, Unfair Hub is a scripthub that finds the best collection of scripts for your game.
